name: Aria's Dungeon game
description:
Little dungeon game i created.

Assets :  https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Music : https://opengameart.org/users/matthew-pablo

If you do have  an idea to improve the game feel free to comment. It can be on enemy behavior, bugs, balance.

Thank you for playing and don't forget to press to upgrade your damge, attack speed and heal.

By maxing your stats you will be rewarded with more chance to get gold.

Have fun!
